title: Font with open character that are normally closed
content:
I am looking for a font similar to the one in the image. I want to make wood signs with custom names. I need a font that has character like "a" "o" "e" "d", etc to have breaks in the letters. If you use a normal font, the middle of the letter will "fall out'" and the character will lose its details.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725004930im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wood%20sign%20font_6720.png)
author: JimInWoodstock

comments.content:
The font in your image is **[PoorRichard](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725004930/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/poor-richard-rr/)** by Paul Hickson

The general font category you describe is "stencil fonts":  
 [http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=114](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725004930/http:/www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=114 "http://www.dafont.com/theme.php?cat=114")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search/stencil/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725004930/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/stencil/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/stencil/fonts/")
